source.name: EPA Water Services - Event Indexing Service
source.description: The WATERS Web and Database services provide open interfaces to complex analyses. These services make extensive use of the NHD and referenced program data in the RAD, and also integrate other WATERS program data. Designed as loosely coupled modular units, the services are developed in a common architecture.  The WATERS (Watershed Assessment, Tracking & Environmental ResultS) indexing engine allows applications to programmatically index features to the medium resolution National Hydrography Dataset and to create RAD (Reach Address Database)-ready event records.
